topics.body: I know I've been talking a lot about video games lately and I know I talked about the game already in the unpopular opinions thread, but damn the disgaea universe(it's not just one franchise or one game) sure has consistently good with the lowest rated game out of them got a b rating.  For twelve games that have been going on for over a decade that's pretty impressive to have the lowest rated one just get a 8/10 by players.
